name: Dolce Italia Chicken Ravioli
description: Chicken ravioli is a tender Italian Dumpling stuffed with minced chicken breast for a true Italian experience, made from 100% Sri Lankan ingredients, easy to cook in just a few minutes and contains no preservatives, dyes or sugar. Please note that our team at Cargills Online has taken all the necessary precautions in order to deliver this item in its frozen state to your doorstep.  *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
